citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
At time of inspection, the facility did not have documentation of meeting the requirement for regularly scheduled visits to
the premises by the attending veterinarian (AV) in accordance with their Program of Veterinary Care, which is twice per
year. The formal arrangement with an attending or consulting veterinarian shall include regularly scheduled visits to the
premises, in addition to the written program of veterinary care. Each dealer shall employ an attending veterinarian under
formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal
arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the
dealer or exhibitor.
Correct by: 04/22/2025

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
There were 3 adult sows in Farrowing enclosures with approximately 1-2 inch diameter abrasions on the their sides that
been treated appropriately with topical antibiotic cream, but the treatments had not been recorded on the pen card.
Additionally, another sow was mildly lame that had also not been recorded on the animals pen card. The facility uses the
pen cards to communicate treatment with the attending veterinarian. All animals should be observed on a daily basis, with
any problems conveyed to the attending veterinarian in a timely manner. Failure to consult with a veterinarian and provide
appropriate diagnostics and treatment can result in a poor outcome for animals.
Correct by: 04/22/2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
At time of inspection, the facility did not have documentation of meeting the requirement for regularly scheduled visits to 
the premises by the attending veterinarian (AV) in accordance with their Program of Veterinary Care, which is twice per 
year. The formal arrangement with an attending or consulting veterinarian shall include regularly scheduled visits to the 
premises, in addition to the written program of veterinary care. Each dealer shall employ an attending veterinarian under 
formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal 
arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the 
dealer or exhibitor.  
Correct by: 04/22/2025 
2.40(b)(3) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
There were 3 adult sows in Farrowing enclosures with approximately 1-2 inch diameter abrasions on the their sides that 
been treated appropriately with topical antibiotic cream, but the treatments had not been recorded on the pen card. 
Additionally, another sow was mildly lame that had also not been recorded on the animals pen card. The facility uses the 
pen cards to communicate treatment with the attending veterinarian. All animals should be observed on a daily basis, with 
any problems conveyed to the attending veterinarian in a timely manner. Failure to consult with a veterinarian and provide 
appropriate diagnostics and treatment can result in a poor outcome for animals. 
Correct by: 04/22/2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
